name: Unreal Fluid Dynamics
description:
Learning Fluid Dynamics in a online multiplayer immersive 3D/VR learning environment.

This is a first prototype, it is rather empty still.  
The future of the project; https://unreal.fluiddynamics.eu/the-project/

What you download is a client to get access to  the 3D  world which is running on a server.

The project is build with Unreal Engine 4.27.2
